Gujarat.name: Ahmedabad
Gujarat.description: Largest city, known for Sabarmati Ashram and textile industry.

Gujarat.name: Amreli
Gujarat.description: Part of Saurashtra region, known for temples.

Gujarat.name: Anand
Gujarat.description: Milk capital of India, home to Amul.

Gujarat.name: Aravalli
Gujarat.description: Newly formed district, rich in forests and minerals.

Gujarat.name: Banaskantha
Gujarat.description: Famous for Ambaji Temple and dairy farming.

Gujarat.name: Bharuch
Gujarat.description: Ancient port city on the Narmada River.

Gujarat.name: Bhavnagar
Gujarat.description: Coastal city known for ship-breaking yard at Alang.

Gujarat.name: Botad
Gujarat.description: New district formed from Bhavnagar region.

Gujarat.name: Chhota Udaipur
Gujarat.description: Tribal district with rich culture and art.

Gujarat.name: Dahod
Gujarat.description: Tribal district known for handicrafts.

Gujarat.name: Dang
Gujarat.description: Smallest district, known for Saputara hill station.

Gujarat.name: Devbhoomi Dwarka
Gujarat.description: Home to famous Dwarkadhish Temple.

Gujarat.name: Gandhinagar
Gujarat.description: State capital, known for Akshardham Temple.

Gujarat.name: Gir Somnath
Gujarat.description: Famous for Somnath Temple and Gir National Park.

Gujarat.name: Jamnagar
Gujarat.description: Known for Reliance refinery and marine life sanctuary.

Gujarat.name: Junagadh
Gujarat.description: Historic city at the foot of Girnar hills.

Gujarat.name: Kheda
Gujarat.description: Associated with Sardar Patel and independence movement.

Gujarat.name: Kutch
Gujarat.description: Largest district, home to Rann of Kutch.

Gujarat.name: Mahisagar
Gujarat.description: New district, formed from Panchmahal region.

Gujarat.name: Mehsana
Gujarat.description: Known for dairy industry and Modhera Sun Temple.

Gujarat.name: Morbi
Gujarat.description: Ceramic city of India, known for clock towers and tiles.

Gujarat.name: Narmada
Gujarat.description: Home to Statue of Unity and Sardar Sarovar Dam.

Gujarat.name: Navsari
Gujarat.description: Known for Zoroastrian community and agriculture.

Gujarat.name: Panchmahal
Gujarat.description: Rich in history and tribal culture.

Gujarat.name: Patan
Gujarat.description: Home of Rani ki Vav, a UNESCO site.

Gujarat.name: Porbandar
Gujarat.description: Birthplace of Mahatma Gandhi, coastal heritage city.

Gujarat.name: Rajkot
Gujarat.description: Major industrial and cultural center of Saurashtra.

Gujarat.name: Sabarkantha
Gujarat.description: Known for scenic Aravalli ranges and handicrafts.

Gujarat.name: Surat
Gujarat.description: Diamond and textile hub of India.

Gujarat.name: Surendranagar
Gujarat.description: Known for salt production and handicrafts.

Gujarat.name: Tapi
Gujarat.description: Agricultural district named after Tapi River.

Gujarat.name: Vadodara
Gujarat.description: Cultural capital, known for Laxmi Vilas Palace.

Gujarat.name: Valsad
Gujarat.description: Coastal district known for beaches and Alphonso mangoes.
